Name: Gleichsam einem Garten
Notes: Winner of the Leni Neuenschwander Prize (Gedok) 1998. Demanding ensemble playing required. A light and delicate world of sound that contains no hint of gloom or distortion only the neat orderliness of a herb garden and a song of praise to creation.
Long Description: A Hommage to Hildegard von Bingen. A light and delicate world of sound that contains no hint of gloom or distortion only the neat orderliness of a herb garden and a song of praise to creation.
Short Description: A Hommage to Hildegard von Bingen for Ms, Bar, Fl, Klar, VI, Vc, Vibr, Akk.
